evidence.claim: Zuhri Care uses AWS services for cloud infrastructure including AWS Lambda and S3 for data storage and processing.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations to protect patient data and uses FHIR standards for interoperability in health data exchange.
Integration patterns include RESTful APIs for third-party EHR systems and webhook support for real-time data notifications.

icp.icp_reason: Limited evidence of handling X12 transactions despite tech stack.
